text:
Very skillfull & experienced PDR repairman. Superb & meticulous workmanship. Very satisfied with the outcome of the repair, the dents are no longer visible. Totally recommended!
Avoid walk is not recommended, contact him to book appointment for your repair.

A small shop at the corner of the block. Very experienced guy. Winston will take a look at the damage and give his opinion and how much he can recover. He also explained in detail how he is going to do it. And if I am acceptable with his explanation and price then he will start working on it. A true master of his craft with decades of experience in doing this. Definitely my go-to place for PDR in future. Highly recommended.

Thank you Uncle Winston who helped me to repair and remove all dents on my car door. Uncle Winston is a humble guy and did not over promise on the result, he mentioned that result of fixing dents were only 70 percent. The final result is 90 percent plus. The price Quoted was very reasonable according to his best efforts. Highly recommend to go for fixing the small dent issues.
Winston is a skilled craftsman and artist. Iâ€™ve admired his work for many years, and used his services for 3 cars over the past 15 years.
Really the best in the business. When everyone tell me no way need to putty respray Winston manage to salvage for me. Pity he's retiring soon. Hope he can find his successor.
